snippet.title: Release Trailer
snippet.description:
DEEP SIXED™ will be released on February 12th, 2018 for PC, Mac and Linux.

While other games might have you play the role of the stalwart space-captain righting the injustices of the universe, DEEP SIXED™ is a game for the Scotty’s, Geordi’s and O’Brien’s out there with a space-wrench and a roll of duct tape trying to keep the radiation scrubber from falling apart.

localized.title: Release Trailer

While other games might have you play the role of the stalwart space-captain righting the injustices of the universe, DEEP SIXED™ is a game for the Scotty’s, Geordi’s and O’Brien’s out there with a space-wrench and a roll of duct tape trying to keep the radiation scrubber from falling apart.
